alert.note: Alert for Butts; Lamar; Monroe; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 14 at 2:46PM EDT until September 14 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Spalding County in west central Georgia... Central Monroe County in central Georgia... Southwestern Butts County in central Georgia... Eastern Lamar County in west central Georgia... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 245 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chappel Mill, or 9 miles east of Griffin, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Barnesville, Forsyth, Milner, Orchard Hill, Goggins, Berner, McKibben, Brent, Chappel Mill, High Falls State Park, Blount, Liberty Hill, Collier, Johnstonville, and Juliette. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
